sentences.en: A blast of hot air came from the furnace.
sentences.cn: 一股热风从火炉里吹出来.

sentences.en: All control equipment should be located in the furnace control room.
sentences.cn: 所有的控制设备都应当装在窑炉控制室里.

sentences.en: All trim scrap is conveyed back to the furnace.
sentences.cn: 所有修整边料传送回铅锅.

sentences.en: An adjustable plate, as in the flue of a furnace or stove, for controlling the draft.
sentences.cn: 挡板，调节风门一种可调节的薄片，如在熔炉或火炉的通气管中的，用来控制气流。

sentences.en: Embers glowed in the furnace.
sentences.cn: 余烬在炉膛中发出光亮.

sentences.en: He pushed her toward the open furnace door.
sentences.cn: 他把她推向开着的炉门.

sentences.en: How can we walk? It's a furnace out there.
sentences.cn: 我们怎么能走路呢？外面跟火炉似的。

sentences.en: It is time he banked up the furnace.
sentences.cn: 他该把炉子封起来了。

sentences.en: It was hot summer and at the edge of the desert it was like a furnace.
sentences.cn: 那是一个炎热的夏天，在沙漠的边缘，天热得像火炉一样。

sentences.en: It's like a furnace (= very hot) in here!
sentences.cn: 这里热得像火炉！

sentences.en: Keep away from the furnace.
sentences.cn: 不要靠近炉子.

sentences.en: Take it down to the basement and throw it into the furnace. "
sentences.cn: 快给我拿到地下室里,丢到火炉里.

sentences.en: The fire in the furnace warms this cold air.
sentences.cn: 炉灶里的火对进来的冷空气加热.

sentences.en: The furnace has a design that allows the flame to burn at a lower temperature.
sentences.cn: 这炉子的设计可以让火苗在较低的温度下燃烧。

sentences.en: The graceful preface was laced by a commonplace maid near the furnace in the palace without any trace of embrace.
sentences.cn: 这份优雅的前言是由一个平凡的侍女在宫殿里的火炉边，不留住拥抱过的痕迹而系上带子的。

sentences.en: The metal glowed in the furnace.
sentences.cn: 金属在熔炉里发出灼热的光。

sentences.en: The temperature of the blast furnace raced up.
sentences.cn: 高炉的温度急剧上升.

sentences.en: There was a low protecting wall to knock down the heat blasting from the pit of the furnace.
sentences.cn: 有一堵低矮的护壁挡住从炉膛里喷出的火焰.

sentences.en: To smelt iron ore in a blast furnace can obtain iron.
sentences.cn: 在高炉中熔炼铁矿石,可取得铁.

sentences.en: We had better fire up the furnace.
sentences.cn: 我们最好把炉子生起来.

sentences.en: You should scrape the ashes out from the furnace.
sentences.cn: 你该把炉灰扒出来.

trans.tran_en: a large container for a very hot fire, used to produce power, heat, or liquid metal
